devTool.description: It provides developers with a suite of tools and infrastructure to build, deploy, and host decentralized applications
It provides developers with a suite of tools and infrastructure to build, deploy, and host decentralized applications
The Aptos CLI is a tool to compile and test Move contracts. It can also quickly play with Aptos features on-chain
Official SDKs like TypeScript, Python, .NET, Rust, Unity, C++ and Go are used for building, testing, and debugging applications on Aptos
The Aptos Wallet Adapter provides a single interface for Aptos dapps and Aptos wallets to communicate with each other
It provides an extensive toolkit, including REST and RPC APIs and SDKs, for developers to build Web3 applications and integrate with various blockchain networks
